name: Not to fall!
description:
*This Game is not the final product and is under development since i'm the only developer working also doing other stuffs from UI to Game design so I don't know if it will ever be finished or when but heres a fun demo you can play*

Hi Folks!!!!

this my first game called Not to fall! the rules are simple answer correctly and don't do mistakes because if you do our poor character will fall(he will fall anyway lol) because he have anxiety of high grounds I hope you all enjoy this project and cheers!!!

Boshargaming is personal brand for developer called Hussain Al-Majali if you want to learn more check out

www.boshargaming.com
